Kudos to our team for clinching the OpenGov Recognition of Excellence Award 2023!

Our engineers partnered @oursingaporearmy,  @st_engineering and @ncsgroupofficial to develop the Next Generation Army Command and Control Information system, which automates tedious processes during battle planning. 

Tapping cloud tech and secure communications, the system also allows the exchange of information across forces in a timely manner 👏🏻
